title: asegstats2table
description: Converts a subcortical stats file created by recon-all and/or mri_segstats (e.g., aseg.stats) into a table.

subjectsfile.title: Subjects File
subjectsfile.description: Name of the file which has the list of subjects (one subject per line).

qdec.title: QDEC Table
qdec.description: Name of the qdec table which has the column of subjects ids (fsid).

qdec_long.title: Longitudinal QDEC Table
qdec_long.description: Name of the longitudinal qdec table with column of tp ids (fsid) and subject templates (fsid-base).

fsgd.title: FSGD File
fsgd.description: Name of the FSGD file to extract subjects from.

segids_from_file.title: Segmentation IDs from File
segids_from_file.description: Output only the segmentations present in the specified file.

segno_include.title: Include Segmentation IDs
segno_include.description: Include only the specified segmentation IDs.

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Measure to report: default is volume (alternative: mean, std).

delimiter.title: Delimiter
delimiter.description: Delimiter between measures in the table. Default is tab (alternative: comma, space, semicolon).

statsfile.title: Stats File
statsfile.description: Use specified stats file instead of 'aseg.stats'.

scale.title: Scale Factor
scale.description: Scale factor for all values written to output file. Default is 1.

write_etiv.title: Write eTIV
write_etiv.description: Report volume as percent estimated total intracranial volume.

transpose_flag.title: Transpose Table
transpose_flag.description: Transpose the table: subjects in columns and segmentations in rows.

common_segs_flag.title: Common Segmentations Flag
common_segs_flag.description: Output only the segmentations common to all stats files.

all_segs_flag.title: All Segmentations Flag
all_segs_flag.description: Output all segmentations in the stats files given.

no_vol_extras_flag.title: No Volume Extras Flag
no_vol_extras_flag.description: Do not include global volume measures like BrainSegVol.

skip_missing_flag.title: Skip Missing Flag
skip_missing_flag.description: Skip subjects that do not have a stats file.

replace53_flag.title: Replace 5.3 Names Flag
replace53_flag.description: Replace 5.3 structure names with later names.
